sub_title: 𝗜 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗶𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗲 𝗽𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻 𝗍𝗈 𝖻𝖾𝖼𝗈𝗆𝖾 a brilliant Supply Chain Professional
summary:
𝗜 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗶𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗲 𝗽𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻!To learn about everything it takes to become a brilliant 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹: Logistics, People skills, Cross-Cultural Cooperation and much more!

𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗬𝗢𝗨 𝗖𝗔𝗡 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗖𝗧 :


✔️ 𝗔𝗣𝗜𝗖𝗦 𝗠𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝘂𝗯𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁
✔️ 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 and 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 during class
✔️ Storytelling and other didactics that work to grab the attention of the students
✔️ Creation of a nice atmosphere during lecture where people share their experiences 

𝗦𝗢𝗠𝗘 𝗢𝗙 𝗠𝗬 𝗥𝗘𝗦𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗦

📌 Implemented Canvas LMS for 5'000 students and 250 teachers
📌 Developed courses and content on Change Management, Business Process Reengineering etc. 
📌 Wrote four books on management

𝗠𝗬 𝗥𝗘𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡:

👌 " Rob is a fountain of knowledge and an enthousiastic, never-boring teacher"
👌 " I like the many examples and stories that Rob uses in the class" 
👌 " Even after 20 years I still remember what Rob learned me about forecasting"

𝗠𝗢𝗥𝗘 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗠𝗘:

After finishing my University of Technology in Eindhoven I worked as a software engineer and project manager at Burroughs. 
Then I became IT manager at a manufacturing company, where I switched to logistics management. Then I went into logistics and quality consulting and teaching, and in this role I discovered the fun of teaching and I also started to work with APICS. 
So then I  made my final move and went back to university as a senior lecturer. During one of my many classes I met a Czech Supply Chain professional and we decided to start an 𝗔𝗣𝗜𝗖𝗦 𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗶𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗮𝗴𝘂𝗲, 𝗖𝘇𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗮  simply because 𝗔𝗣𝗜𝗖𝗦 was not active in Middle Europe. 
Recently I retired from university so I can devote all my time to teaching, travelling and roadcycling.
